title: Listener Stories: Vol. 2
description: In the second episode of listener stories, Em and Christine read some of the creepiest lisetener submissions yet. Hear some poignant stories from listeners with loved ones who’ve passed away, plus an insanely creepy story of a home with a dark past. #andthatswhywedrink
author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
